statements: DELETE FROM SolarPanelEnergyProduction WHERE production_date = '2022-10-15' AND energy_produced > 1000;
DELETE FROM SolarPanelEnergyProduction WHERE panel_id = 1 AND production_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM SolarPanelEnergyProduction WHERE energy_produced >= 1000 AND production_time <= '12:00:00';
DELETE FROM SolarPanelCertification WHERE panel_id IN (SELECT panel_id FROM SolarPanelCertification WHERE production_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM Certification WHERE certification_result = FALSE;
DELETE FROM CertificationRecords WHERE panel_id = 100 AND certification_result = 'PASS';
